alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 9:52PM EST until February 12 at 2:38PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and J.T. Myers Dam. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. .Snow, sleet, and ice melt from last week`s winter storm will cause points along the Ohio River to rise and remain above minor flood stage into this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data available at this time. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 36.9 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
